name: Mortal Kombat Legends: Battle of the Realms
name_cn: 真人快打传奇：王国之战
summary: The Earthrealm heroes must journey to Outworld and fight for the survival of their homeland, invaded by the forces of evil warlord Shao Kahn, in the tournament to end all tournaments: the final Mortal Kombat.
info:
• 中文名: 真人快打传奇：王国之战
  • 上映年度: 2021
  • 片长: 1h 29min
